title: i thought you couldnt get championship skins from hextech?
body:
So.. i read on NA boards that
Legacy, Legendary and Ultimate skins will be included (as shards which you can upgrade or re-roll into). Limited skins will not be included.
but i just got CS shyv from hextech chest......
doesn't she count as a limited skin?

replies.body: bud iv got 4 limited skins from hextech shut up or riot will fix xD

Hey 5318008,

CS Riven is the only Limited one among them. The rest are Legacy skins and can be obtained through Mystery gifts and Hextech crafting. You can check out the whole Legacy and Limited list here; https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins
